name: Space Fighter (itch) (Adam Raybould)
description:
This was a game I worked on around 5 years ago back during my time at College. It's a space shooter game similar to something like Asteroids or even Sinistar (Just not as fast paced and sadly no SINISTAR).

I haven't touched this project since College so there is likely a lot of bugs and general issues with the game. There currently isn't a end or even death sequence within the game so getting past round 5 or dying will result in nothing happening and you'll need to manually restart it. 

Controls - WASD to move the ship, left click to fire, and right click to use a bomb. Bombs are displayed below your health at the top left, with new bombs being acquired by destroying asteroids. Asteroids can also drop health.
